title: Top hashtags used by U.S. Congress Democrats in 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Hashtag, and Total number of mentions in each Hashtag on the y axis.
Hashtag #forthepeople has the highest Total number of mentions and #hr1 has the lowest Total number of mentions.
The difference of Total number of mentions between the highest and lowest Hashtag is 5278.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Hashtag in the x axis and Total number of mentions in the y axis.
Hashtag #forthepeople has the highest Total number of mentions and #hr1 has the lowest Total number of mentions.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Hashtag, and Total number of mentions in each Hashtag on the y axis.
Hashtag #forthepeople has the highest Total number of mentions and #hr1 has the lowest Total number of mentions.
The difference of Total number of mentions between the highest and lowest Hashtag is 5278.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total number of mentions for 10 number of Hashtags.
The Total number of mentions is appeared to be the highest at Hashtag #forthepeople and lowest at Hashtag #hr1.
The second highest Total number of mentions is appeared to be the Hashtag #trumpshutdown.
There is a difference of 5278.0 between the maximum Hashtag #forthepeople and minimum Hashtag #hr1.
Hashtag #forthepeople is higher than any other Hashtags with value 6961.0, followed by #trumpshutdown, and #protectourcare. Down to Hashtag #hr1 with the lowest value 1683.0.
Hashtag #hr8, and #actonclimate share the same value 2206.0.
The Hashtag #hr1 tends to be 2.54 percent lower than average.
